history.proof: intros m k x Hmap Hx. strivial use: eqc_bottom_top.

original: intros m k x Hmap Hx. unfold eqc, bottom. split; intros H; [destruct m | destruct m; destruct H as [H1 | [H2 | H3]]]. - contradiction. - destruct H1 as [Hx0 Hx0']; left; auto. - right; left; auto. - destruct (eq_dart_dec x x0) as [Heq | Hneq]; [subst x0|]. + subst x; auto. + apply (H Hneq). - destruct (eq_dart_dec z (bottom m k z)) as [Heq | Hneq]; [subst z|]. + exfalso; auto. + apply (H Hneq).
